Module org.nasdanika.maven
Package org.nasdanika.maven

Class AbstractCommandMojo

java.lang.Object
org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
org.nasdanika.maven.AbstractCommandMojo
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo
public abstract class AbstractCommandMojo extends org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
Base class for plugins which execute Command's. This class creates a Context and a ProgressMonitor and then executes a command returned from createCommand() method. Properties of the maven project are available under maven/project prefix in the context. E.g. maven/project/version.
